TopicTitle: Is my kerbal version up to date?

Articles.Content: Just wondering, in game readout is: "1.3.0.1884"
It's already 1.3.1, but why do you ask? Steam and gog have notifications about updates, not sure how it works with direct download from ksp site.

With a direct download from the website, you just get the files. The Linux game requires just an unzip, and no additional installs. Your PC does not connect to the internet when you launch the game. There are no notifications... but frankly, if you are a member of this forum, all it takes is a quick look at the Announcements subsection of the forum!

 

Btw, many many many many compliments to Squad for not giving in to the common misconception that gamers like to be monitored, spammed and treated like thieves and hackers. If they keep treating their customers this way, they have a customer for life in me. The way I can "install" this game is absolutely golden.
